node.title: Decision to cancel Novak Djokovic's Australian visa overturned by court
node.description: The 34-year-old has been detained since Thursday.
node.content: ["The decision to cancel Novak Djokovic's Australian visa has been quashed, a Melbourne court has ruled.", "Djokovic, 34, was detained at the border upon his arrival into Australia last week, after travelling to the country under the assumption he had an exemption to enter despite not being vaccinated against COVID-19.", "The world No.1 had been in an immigration detention hotel since Thursday, awaiting the verdict on whether he'd be allowed to remain in Australia after his visa was revoked at Melbourne Airport.", "But in a hearing in Melbourne, the Federal Circuit and Family Court of Australia overturned the decision, to see Djokovic avoid deportation.", "He will now be released from detention and will get his passport back. However immigration minister Alex Hawke has the power to personally intervene and decide to cancel his visa.", "More to come.", "\u00a0"]
